mapper.select: select NAME from LONTION where lower(NAME) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'
select ADDRESS from LONTION where lower(ADDRESS) like '%'||lower(#{searchWord})||'%'

select name, address , img, regDay , star, starcnt from ( select rownum AS rno, largecategoryontioncode, name, address, ontionType, img, regDay, hotelidx, star, starcnt from ( select name, largecategoryontioncode, address, ontionType, img , to_char(regDay, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDay from lontion ) V LEFT JOIN ( select hotelidx,avg(star) AS STAR,count(*) AS starcnt from review group by hotelidx ) R on V.largecategoryontioncode = R.hotelidx ) T where rno between 1 and 9

select count(*) from ( select fk_reserveid, checkin, checkout, reserveid, fk_productid, price, reservedate, memberidx, status , nonight, productid, fk_largecategoryontioncode, roomoption, productname, weekprice, weekenprice, roominfo, productstatus, productperiod1, productperiod2, roomtype from ( select fk_reserveid, checkin, checkout, reserveid, fk_productid, price, reservedate, memberidx, status , (checkout - checkin)+1 AS nonight from reserve2 R2 JOIN reserve1 R1 on R2.fk_reserveid = R1.reserveid where ( #{checkIn} BETWEEN checkin+1 AND checkout-1 OR #{checkOut} BETWEEN checkin+1 AND checkout-1 OR (#{checkIn} < checkin+1 AND checkout-1 < #{checkOut})) and fk_productid=#{fk_productId} ) V RIGHT JOIN product P on V.fk_productid = P.productid where productid=#{fk_productId} and checkin is null ) P RIGHT JOIN LONTION L on P.fk_largecategoryontioncode = L.largecategoryontioncode where productid=#{fk_productId}
mapper.insert: insert into reserve1(reserveid, fk_productid, price, memberidx) values(seq_reserve1_reserveid.nextval, #{fk_productId}, #{price}, #{memberIdx})
mapper.select: select largecategoryontioncode, name from ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cnt desc) rno, name, cnt, largecategoryontioncode from ( select count(*) as cnt ,hotelidx from hotelviews group by hotelidx )HV JOIN ( select * from lontion )L on HV.hotelidx = L.largecategoryontioncode ) where rno between 1 and 9
